places_to_visit.name: Tromsø Arctic-Alpine Botanic Garden
places_to_visit.description: The Tromsø Arctic-Alpine Botanic Garden features a diverse collection of Arctic and alpine plants. It’s a unique spot to experience plant life adapted to extreme conditions.

places_to_visit.name: Northern Lights
places_to_visit.description: Tromsø is one of the best places to witness the Northern Lights, or Aurora Borealis. The city offers various tours and excursions to view this natural phenomenon.

places_to_visit.name: Polaria
places_to_visit.description: Polaria is an Arctic aquarium and experience center that provides insights into Arctic marine life and ecosystems. It includes an interactive exhibition and a panoramic cinema.

places_to_visit.name: Tromsø Cathedral
places_to_visit.description: Tromsø Cathedral is the northernmost Protestant cathedral in the world. It features a unique wooden structure and offers insight into the local culture and history.

places_to_visit.name: Fjellheisen Cable Car
places_to_visit.description: The Fjellheisen Cable Car takes visitors to the top of Mount Storsteinen, offering panoramic views of Tromsø and the surrounding Arctic landscape.
